amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for extending preschool opportunities to children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 617 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 617 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Casey. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text: CR S3698-3699) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for extending preschool opportunities to children.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 617 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 617 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Casey.
